attributes.action: Call for the BBC to sack Robert Peston
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC's Robert Peston has been irresponsible, unprofessional and above all intensely irritating. All pressure must be brought to remove him from our television sets immediately.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
